title: Bloomberg Markets: Schleif's Investment Opportunities (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Schleif's Investment Opportunities (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carol M Schleif Deputy Chief Investment Officer Abbot Downing Investment Advisors Discussing the current market rally and investment opportunities.
